name: Lexington Creative
tagline: Experienced and dedicated mobile app developers
description:
Lexington Creative has years of experience in designing iPhone, iPad, Android and Blackberry applications and providing mobile application consulting services. We have a highly skilled team of artists, programmers and marketers who work together to provide you with a top quality solution that fits your price. We can develop a range of applications- from the more basic and low cost to highly complex and highly interactive ones for those with a greater budget.
We trade on our name and reptuation and so will always provide an impressive application that perfectly matches your requirements. Please have a look at website and contact us for an obligation-free quote.
